coreAttributes.name: Waspley Mk IV .38/200 Service Revolver
coreAttributes.description: Although nearly identical in appearance to its .455 calibre counterpart, this particular top-break, double action revolver is chambered for the smaller .38 cartridge.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(draw)] [npc.her] revolver, ready to use it in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText:
Taking aim with [npc.her] pistol, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger and [npc.verb(fire)] a bullet at [npc2.name], hitting [npc2.herHim] directly in the chest!
Thankfully, there seems to be some kind of arcane force preventing [npc2.name] from being seriously wounded or killed...

missDescriptions.missText: Taking aim with [npc.her] pistol, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger and fires a bullet at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
